subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
organizations: Royal Lytham & St Annes Golf Club
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott, a 32-year-old Australian whose caddie, Steve Williams, used to work for Tiger Woods, shot a 68 to take a four-stroke lead into the final round of the British Open.
snippet: Adam Scott, a 32-year-old Australian whose caddie, Steve Williams, used to work for Tiger Woods, shot a 68 to take a four-stroke lead into the final round of the British Open.
